name: Ouroboros Ring
description:
CONTROLS:

Left mouse button or F key:
Attack
R key:
Restart game.
Escape key or P key:
Pause game and get menu.

STORY:
Something terrible happened on the other side of this abandoned dungeon. Suddenly a mythical old guardian gets awoken by the falling rubble and weird noises. On his way, to discover what is going on, he finds a book on a tomb. That book explains everything about the apocalypse that is bound to happen. It also explains something about a ring and how to stop the evil with it. So the guardian goes searching for that magical ring.

GOAL OF THE GAME:
Find parts of Ouroboros Ring and and get to the end of the dungeon.
If you kill enemy, you regenerate health.
If you hurt yourself, the curse timer decreases.

You die if health reaches 0 or if curse bar fills up.
